# Strings Docs

> Documentation for Strings Docs.

- [How to determine whether a string represents a numeric value](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/strings/how-to-determine-whether-a-string-represents-a-numeric-value.md): Learn how to determine whether a string is a valid representation of a specified numeric type. See code examples and view additional resources.
- [Strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/strings/index.md): Learn about strings in C# programming. See information on declaring and initializing strings, the immutability of string objects, and string escape sequences.
